description:
Mihirogi Uta is a color commentator for the inter-high and a professional mahjong player. She is paired with Hariu Eri. Uta is very knowledgeable but prone to be a bit flighty. Later when Kouko Fukuyo and Sukoya Kokaji get slated to call Shiraitodai`s semi-finals match, she noted to Eri that they could use a break and called her jealous when she said Kouko was terrible.
Source: Saki Wikia
name: Mihirogi Uta
